page.title: 13Leisure time activities
page.content: We have been finding out what activities people from our school and village do in their spare time and how long they do them for.When we started our project we had to record the answers that people gave us and what we were going to ask them. We found out that the most popular activity was watching television.25 children watched it for 298 hours in one week.We asked eleven parents how long they watched television for.The results were 201 hours.Reading was second most popular with 82 hours for children and 51 hours for adults.We also found out that a lot of sewing was done in a week.
